column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Count me in anytime. Lou's in my opinion is the best deep dish in Chicago. Nice crust
column2: not too doughy and a nice combination of sauce
column3: cheese and sausage. I've gone to several locations. Oak Park
column6: Lincoln Square and the original on Lincoln near Skokie and they are all consistent. I even pick up the frozen ones from time to time to eat at home.
